SAMPLES.DESCRIPTION: An example successful call. The USI was correctly verified.

BODY.MSG: USI Valid but the student's personal data does not match. This must be fixed before their USI can be marked as verified. Please check: First Name.

SAMPLES.DESCRIPTION: An example unsuccessful call. The USI was not verified because the first name did not match. The actual data returned by the USI Service is in the DATA key.

BODY.MSG: An error exists for this contact and must be corrected before calling the USI Service. Date of birth is required.

SAMPLES.DESCRIPTION: An example unsuccessful call. An attempt was not made to verify the USI because data was missing.

PARAMETERS.NAME: contactID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The contactID of the contact to verify.

DESCRIPTION: A wrapper for the USI Service verify USI call. It will return a structure with the boolean key USI_VERIFED and a MSG with any errors.
